items.content_html: EasyCaptchaJS is a lightweight and user-friendly jQuery/JS library that simplifies the integration of Google reCAPTCHA API into web pages. With EasyCaptchaJS, developers can effortlessly add the security and anti-bot protection of reCAPTCHA to their web applications, enhancing their overall security and user experience.
items.title: HichemTab-tech/EasyCaptchaJS: EasyCaptchaJS is a lightweight and user-friendly jQuery/JS library that simplifies the integration of Google reCAPTCHA API into web pages. With EasyCaptchaJS, developers can effortlessly add the security and anti-bot protection of reCAPTCHA to their web applications, enhancing their overall security and user experience.
